sentences.en: A roar of approval resounded through the legislature.
sentences.cn: 一片赞成声在议会中回响。

sentences.en: Allow the intentions to resound between your field and the field the land or sea.
sentences.cn: 允许这些意愿在你的能量场及土地或海洋的能量场中彼此回荡.

sentences.en: Happy ding, resound through Xue Ye , the day of profusion, belong to us.
sentences.cn: 快乐的钟声, 响彻雪野,缤纷的日子, 属于你我.

sentences.en: His name will resound through the ages.
sentences.cn: 他的名字将被整个时代称颂.

sentences.en: His resounding voice continued to resound in my ears long after he was out of sight.
sentences.cn: 他人走远了,但他响亮的声音仍在我耳际回荡.

sentences.en: If I do not need you then why does your name resound in my head?
sentences.cn: 如果我需要你不该那么为什么你的名字在我的头响?

sentences.en: If I don't need you then why does your name resound in my head?
sentences.cn: 如果我不需要你,为何我总是在脑中重覆回响起你的名字?

sentences.en: Let the pulpit resound with the doctrines and sentiments of religious liberty.
sentences.cn: 让我们的讲坛回荡着宗教自由的主张和意见.

sentences.en: Let the sea resound , and everything in it , the world, and all who live in it.
sentences.cn: 愿海和其中所充满的澎湃.世界和住在其间的 、 也要发声.
家家户户传出收音机的广播声.

sentences.en: That will resound long after the applause has faded.
sentences.cn: 即使掌声渐落,您的形象仍会留在人们的脑海中,如余音绕梁.

sentences.en: The LORD thundered from heaven ; the Most High made his voice resound.
sentences.cn: 上主由高天发出雷鸣,至高者吼出他的呼声.

trans.tran_en: if a sound such as a musical note resounds, it continues loudly and clearly for quite a long time

trans.tran_cn: （指声音等）回荡于某处，产生回响，（指某处）回荡着声音
trans.tran_en: if a place resounds with a sound, it is full of that sound
